description: Describes the operating calendar for a system. According to the Standard GBFS 2.2
title: Smart Data Models adaptation of GBFS standard data model system_calendar

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be system_calendar

last_updated.description: Property. Last time the data in the feed was updated in POSIX time.

ttl.description: Property. Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: Property. GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework (added in v1.1).

data.description: Property. Array that contains opertions calendar for the system.

start_month.description: Starting month for the system operations.

start_day.description: Starting day for the system operations.

start_year.description: Starting year for the system operations.

end_month.description: End month for the system operations.

end_day.description: End day for the system operations.

end_year.description: End year for the system operations.
